Effect: Aeon Stone (Uplifting).name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Uplifting)
Effect: Aeon Stone (Uplifting).description: You gain a fly Speed for 1 minute equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Artificial Immortalizer.name: Effect: Artificial Immortalizer
Effect: Artificial Immortalizer.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.0J8PMTLDGIIP1KGE]{Artificial Immortalizer}

You gain 50 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Celebrity Serum.name: Effect: Celebrity Serum
Effect: Celebrity Serum.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.JgVv4m4sh9faVSDD]{Celebrity Serum}

You gain a +1 item bonus to Performance checks.

Effect: Commando Serum.name: Effect: Commando Serum
Effect: Commando Serum.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.Yuws1too4LhO7Cu9]{Commando Serum}

You gain 1d10+5 temporary Hit Points, as well as a +5-foot item bonus to any Speed.

Effect: Explorer's Canteen.name: Effect: Explorer's Canteen
Effect: Explorer's Canteen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.WGdcokSMynEyF332]{Explorer's Canteen}

You gain a +1 item bonus to saves against any poisons or diseases present in food or water.

Effect: Force Field.name: Effect: Force Field
Effect: Force Field.description: Tracking effect for your force field's HP.

Effect: Hypopen (Quickened or Fast Heali.name: Effect: Hypopen (Quickened or Fast Healing)
Effect: Hypopen (Quickened or Fast Heali.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.gRZxPwfmz3O0bgOt]{Hypopen (Elite)} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.6JzH3VDHqv2rZJer]{Hypopen (Ultimate)}

Choose one of the following benefits.

  • You become quickened. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
  • You gain fast healing 10.

Effect: Infiltrator Serum.name: Effect: Infiltrator Serum
Effect: Infiltrator Serum.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.u82tssnDgj4f9UCS]{Infiltrator Serum}

You gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Sneak and Disable a Device.

Effect: Medpatch.name: Effect: Medpatch
Effect: Medpatch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.B0FiYMxy7iDiHh48]{Medpatch (Commercial)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.HWHdAQArhRauTpm6]{Medpatch (Tactical)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.55nSLw1aQ0K0rK2L]{Medpatch (Advanced)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.6VDHl7xkSp8Sc8yy]{Medpatch (Superior)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.KFjPEG7kw733splu]{Medpatch (Elite)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.dJyYifMFfgbIwT3c]{Medpatch (Ultimate)}

You gain an item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons.

Effect: Parry.name: Effect: Parry
Effect: Parry.description: You gain a circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Effect: Raise a Shield
Effect: Raise a Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}

When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Sharpshooter Serum.name: Effect: Sharpshooter Serum
Effect: Sharpshooter Serum.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.xBlfbu0fUmV6ucqR]{Sharpshooter Serum (Commercial)}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.vcCeNRokXv5HSlRf]{Sharpshooter Serum (Tactical)}

The circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover against your ranged Strikes is reduced.

Effect: Sharpshooter Serum (Reduce Cover.name: Effect: Sharpshooter Serum (Reduce Cover)
Effect: Sharpshooter Serum (Reduce Cover.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.xBlfbu0fUmV6ucqR]{Sharpshooter Serum}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.vcCeNRokXv5HSlRf]{Sharpshooter Serum (Tactical)} via Ephemeral Effect

Your circumstance bonus to AC from cover is reduced.
